18/03/25, 5:51â€¯pm - +91 93284 89256: After reaching here now its time to talk about love 
its kind of a escapism from what i am feeling 
its like telling things which i wasn't so aware about

so there are basically 2 things in love according to me 
the first what you can do for love
nd the second what you should do for love

what you can do is literally anything .
you can do anything for this trust me you go beyond everything.
and it may sound scary but if you love someone its like breathing ;seamless.
you want to see them happy, progressive and most importantly healthy you can do whatever it takes to make them healthy because you can not see them in pain nd physical pain is one you can take control over so yes you do stuff for that.
you stay there for them no matter what the situation is 
your behavior will be changed, a little cringe i guess for them cause somewhere we all know that cringe leads to smile (mostly a sarcastic one but it does)
your approach towards future changes because now they are with you 
you constantly making space for them 
you change some of your habits for them to make them feel comfortable.
and there is a other thing comes with it EXPECTATIONS nothing more but expecting the same things which you are doing. 
quite fair thing no!!!! 
nooo not at all mannnn there's the catch ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„
when you do it you should know that you are cookedğŸ˜Œ
we will talk in detail about this later on.....
just focus on the title here
what you can do!!!!!
you shine
you smile
you dance 
you sing
you follow
you notice
you consider
you pray
you stay
you care
every possible thing you can do.
yes ! you fight
you cry
you beg
you drag
you literally make life hard for them sometimes,
nd ya i know we can justify it but the silent factor is EXPECTATION onlyğŸ˜¶ 




Now let us come to what you should do for love.... ummm kind of interesting 
 
what i have experienced is you just let them be , let them be their selves 
let yourself be yourself 
make some boundaries 
make some confessions on that things which you cant have control on i mean to say is you can not tolerate or you can not stand 
let them know what make you uncomfortable 
try to know them 
try to learn them
respect their privacy
respect their decision 
just be there nd your job is done
let them grow around you let yourself grow
discuss your belief 
discuss your idea of love
rather than expecting too much or giving too much just be calm nd happy and blossom 
yes you should be aware of their intensions but most of the times it will be pure 
just don't let yourself fall 
you should walk through love 
grab the hand of your loved once and walk, explore.
you will be amazed how it flows if you do this
its too hard to do but i think its a right thing to do
what we want from a person lets say our parents what we want ??support right!! in every situation we want them to be on our side then we should support them whenever they need it.
( here them mean your loved once)
and they will be supportive you if they love you its a natural things Bhai ye aa hi jaata he support and care kahi se bhi aata heğŸ˜ŒğŸŒ¸




as we mention earlier you want to make them happy but at what cost that you need to manage 
if you do stuff that makes you feel bad nd still you are doing it will be the worst thing you can do to your relationship.
of course i m not talking about sacrifice here that i know at some point we all do for love we should do it.
but there should be a clear line a visible clear line beyond that you should not keep doing it it will cost you your peace at the end.


 then the main question arrives that what should we expect ? its your partner no you should expect something from them!!!!
 then my answer will be what you can do is expect yourself to be you. to find its own happiness,  find its own purpose of life,  enjoy your own company 
if you will be you na , you will be free from every burden nd you will enjoy the company. 
be emotionally dependent on someone makes us a little restless 
but ever we thought how that someone feels ,how much burden they will feel if they know that each nd every smallest thing will affect someone deeply 
its so scary really you can not be yourself and whenever you don't feel liberated you quit everybody quits.

so i and if you read this and you are in love both will try to avoid what we can do and start doing what we should do for loveğŸŒ¸

so yes right now i can write this much nd its my take on loveâ¤ï¸
